markups.originaltext: The key principle be-hind these techniques is a feature matching between the testsample and the nominal samples while exploiting the multi-scale nature of deep feature representations. Subtle, fine-grained defect segmentation is covered by high-resolutionfeatures, whereas structural deviations and full image-levelanomaly detection are supposed to be covered by featuresat much higher abstraction levels.

textblocks.text:
The key principle be-
hind these techniques is a feature matching between the test
sample and the nominal samples while exploiting the multi-
scale nature of deep feature representations. Subtle, fine-
grained defect segmentation is covered by high-resolution
features, whereas structural deviations and full image-level
anomaly detection are supposed to be covered by features
at much higher abstraction levels.

markups.originaltext: (1) maximizing nominal information available attest time, (2) reducing biases towards ImageNet classesand (3) retaining high inference speeds.

textblocks.text:
(1) maximizing nominal information available at
test time, (2) reducing biases towards ImageNet classes
and (3) retaining high inference speeds.
